Posts.Content: Hi Tracy Im Lauri, my best friend had the same thing happen, about 2 years ago she had the breast removed and the lymph nodes on the same side, then a year later it went to her liver, and that was just cleared up, now its back in her liver again and going through chemo again once a week. Its hard, i know, we can talk about it and if you want we can get more people involved. Lauri
Posts.Title: Experiences with or Information on Breast Cancer that has metastasized to liver?

Posts.Content: Hi, My best friend has recurring breast cancer to her liver, does anyone know of any new treatments besides chemo and pills? Such as magnetic or implantable devices. Ive recently heard of the Royal Rife, research etc. Lauri
Posts.Title: Recurring Breast Cancer in Liver
